PHRASE.LANG: It's bad enough to break a nail, but it seems like she doesn't have many left to break! At least that will be a discount at the nail salon.[#Legal]
C'est déjà assez difficile de casser un ongle, mais il semble qu'elle n'a pas laissé beaucoup de casser! Au moins ce sera une réduction au salon de manucure.[#Legal]
Es ist schlimm genug, um einen Nagel zu brechen, aber es scheint, wie sie nicht viele links zu brechen! Zumindest wird ein Rabatt auf den Nagel Salon sein.[#Legal]
È già abbastanza brutto per rompere un chiodo, ma sembra che lei non ha lasciato molti di rompere! Almeno questo sarà uno sconto presso il salone di bellezza.[#Legal]
Ya es bastante malo para romper una uña, pero parece que no le han dejado a muchos a romper! Al menos eso será un descuento en el salón de belleza.[#Legal]
It's bad enough to break a nail, but it seems like she doesn't have many left to break! At least that will be a discount at the nail salon.[#Legal]
It's bad enough to break a nail, but it seems like she doesn't have many left to break! At least that will be a discount at the nail salon.[#Legal]
